Live reporting: Argentina is dominating France in the FIFA World Cup, with a 2-0 lead. The second goal, scored by Di Maria, was described as "beautiful" by multiple tweets, highlighting the team's great counter-attacking play and passing skills. Argentina seems to be playing better overall and France is struggling to keep up. #ARGFRA #FIFAWorldCup
